Name: Sweltered
Description: Deals 20 DPS.

Name: Shredded
Description: Inflicted enemies have their defense decreased by 2 and take 2 DoT per stack. Caps at 5 stacks.

Name: Vulnerability
Description: Increases the amount of damage a target takes by their Vulnerability stacks.

Name: Exposure
Description: Multiplies the amount of damage a target takes by their Exposure value before consuming the effect.

Name: Focused
Description: Afflicted enemies have double the chance to be critically striked, however you cannot critically strike any other enemy besides the Focused enemy.

Name: Haunted
Description: Afflicted enemies take 1 DPS per Haunted stack. When an enemy has 20 Haunted stacks, they will cause haunted apparitions to exorcise from them, removing all their Haunted stacks.

Name: Volatile
Description: Afflicted enemies take 7% more damage and deal 3% more damage for every stack of Volatile. Caps at 5 stacks.

Name: Grazes
Description: Occur when an enemies projectile barely misses you. Grazes have a cooldown of 2 seconds by default.

Name: Barrier
Description: Provides significant damage reduction while active. When you resist damage this way, the amount you would have taken is subtracted from your barrier. Your barrier recovers after a brief period of not taking damage.

Name: Starlight
Description: Consumed to cast Abilities. The mystical energy of the mind that governs meaning, memory, and connection, and allows its wielders to accomplish great feats by bringing their will into reality.

Name: Cursed
Description: This item comes with a build-defining boon and a crippling flaw. Curses can usually be worked around, and sometimes even turned in your favor.

Name: Inoculation
Description: Reduces the amount of damage over time you take from debuffs.

Name: Reserve
Description: A resource with an amount reserved cannot go above it's maximum minus it's reserved amount.

Name: Rend
Description: Permanently decreases defense by the specified amount, stacking additively.

Name: Overcharged
Description: Decreases enemy defense and causes them to constantly create shocking sparks, damaging nearby enemies.

Name: Artifact
Description: A buried piece of treasure, identified by the sparkles that appear when shining light over the blocks it's buried within.

Name: Bloodfrenzy
Description: Grants a boost to attack speed, but a decrease to critical strike chance.

Name: Reaping
Description: Consumes stacks of a specified effect to increase the stats of a given move or grant you a different effect.

Name: Dreamfire
Description: Consumed when an enemy is struck with Moonfury to boost the damage of said strike.

Name: Debug
Description: Not intended for use in normal gameplay, and should only be obtainable via cheats or inventory editors. Please submit a bug report at https://github.com/ProjectStarlight/StarlightRiver/issues if you believe you recieved this item in error.
